snippet: The General Services Administration’s inspector general was set to release a yearlong investigation into a conference, when Martha Johnson, the administrator, abruptly resigned.
abstract: Martha Johnson, administrator of the General Services Administration agency, fires her two top deputies and then resigns right before release of report detailing results of yearlong investigation into excessive spending at conference held by the agency in Las Vegas in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The General Services Administration’s inspector general was set to release a yearlong investigation into a conference, when Martha Johnson, the administrator, abruptly resigned.

headline.main: Agency Administrator Fires Deputies, Then Resigns, Amid Spending Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Agency Administrator Fires Deputies, Then Resigns, Amid Spending Inquiry
